scripts.build-linux: pkg dist/index.js -t node12-linux-x64 -o ./bin/linux/gitlab-local-pipeline && gzip -c bin/linux/gitlab-local-pipeline > bin/linux.gz
scripts.build-macos: pkg dist/index.js -t node12-macos-x64 -o ./bin/macos/gitlab-local-pipeline && gzip -c bin/macos/gitlab-local-pipeline > bin/macos.gz
scripts.build-win: pkg dist/index.js -t node12-win-x64 -o ./bin/win/gitlab-local-pipeline && gzip -c bin/win/gitlab-local-pipeline.exe > bin/win.gz
scripts.build-all: npm run build-linux && npm run build-macos && npm run build-win
scripts.check-all: npm run --silent lint && npm audit --parseable && npm run ncu
